Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



Demon Wulf listened, smiling when Reptilica.  "All was good.  Except, when 
you said 'There are maybe factions'."  Demon Wulf nodded to Dark Claw

"As you wish, brother." Dark Claw fired off a ball of red energy from his 
open palm at Reptilica's right foot.

Flesh Ripper almost burst out in laughter at the amusing (to him) sight.
